I can confirm that the droidcrack link works. Thanks a lot!

1. put com.worms2armageddon.app folder in sd/android/obb
2. put apk in a folder just make one called games
3. use astro file manager or whatever u use & go to games folder in ur phone & install apk
4. play

DO NOT DOWNLOAD this torrent.  It plays long enough for people to test it for 2 seconds and think it works, but if you actually play the game, you are detected as a software pirate, and it puts little pirate hats on all your worms and makes them sick and slowly lose HP.  

Can we please get rid of this torrent?
